Torin::

"No kidding." Torin hauls out one last beacon from his 
crate.  "Devilcat just paged everyone on the emergency freq, anyway.  
Something about a Maximal craft plunking down almost on our doorstep."

<><><>

Jayde/Fury::

As she walks by the crew quarters, Jayde is startled when one door 
opens.  When a bleary-eyed mongoose sticks its head out, she 
laughs.  "Not very often you see that on Rogue Star - Fury half-
asleep!"

"Ver-ry funny," the newly-awakened Rogue growls.  "Where's Devilcat?"

"He just called everyone to meet him outside."  The blue-and-black 
bot illustrates her statement by heading in that direction, with Fury 
following, his grogginess slowly being shaken off.

--- In nbwrpg@y..., "Jeff" <x_rauq_x@y...> wrote:
> -- Noir --
> 
> Noir knocks over the last untouched box in the room, having found 
> another 5 communicator beacons.
> 
> "Hey Torin, you done with that container?" Noir walks over to the 
> com beacon box, and throws her 5 in.
> 
> Turning back to Torin, "We should report to Devilcat soon. He's 
> gonna want to know we've found a bunch of these beacons."
> 
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@y..., "Jeff" <x_rauq_x@y...> wrote:
> > -- Noir --
> > 
> > Noir looks back at the lizard and his slightly muffled voice, and 
> a 
> > fleeting edge of a smile crosses the corner of her mouth. "OK."
> > 
> > She dumps out the container she'd been looking in, and then 
> finding 
> > nothing, she slides it over to the collection of checked 
> containers. 
> > Then she grabs another box, and finds one sitting on top, "Got 
> > another." She tosses it into the collection box.
> > 
> >
